report.title: List of plots for Plant Portal
report.description: Basic list of plots for Plant Portal.
report.query:
SELECT #columns# FROM locations l LEFT JOIN locations_websites lw on lw.location_id=l.id and lw.deleted=false LEFT JOIN samples locationSamples on locationSamples.location_id = l.id AND locationSamples.training=false AND locationSamples.deleted=false #joins# WHERE l.deleted=false AND (l.public=true or lw.website_id in (#website_ids#))
#filters#

param.name: current_user
param.description: Current user's warehouse ID. Allows a column to be output indicating that the user owns the record.

param.name: parent_id
param.description: ID of the parent site to filter to

param.name: admin_mode
param.description: Should user be able to edit plots user didn't create

column.name: show_plot_view_control
column.sql: CASE WHEN (#admin_mode# = false AND l.created_by_id = #current_user# AND count(locationSamples.id) = 0) THEN false WHEN (#admin_mode# = true AND count(locationSamples.id) = 0) THEN false ELSE true END

column.name: show_plot_edit_control
column.sql: CASE WHEN (#admin_mode# = false AND l.created_by_id = #current_user# AND count(locationSamples.id) = 0) THEN true WHEN (#admin_mode# = true AND count(locationSamples.id) = 0) THEN true ELSE false END
